start_boss.text: I've never seen so many ships in one place.
Go get him! Kill him! Kill him!
I don't know if I can do this... I'm braced.

retreat.text: I don't wanna die, damnit! Move it!
Why are we sticking around? We need to go!

hull_90.text: Woah, I felt that in my teeth.

hull_50.text: We've taken a hit! Systems are still up!
Don't know if we can take another hit like that!
I- I don't think I can take much more of this.
I swear to God I'll throw my neck out!

hull_30.text: Oh God, please not now after all this, please God!

overload.text: You're really pushing me to my limit.

death.text: I cant keep up... I cant.

victory.text: We really caught them with their pants down.
You make my job easy as usual.
Think we can afford to share a bottle of Red?
I'm in the black for the week.
Thats right, you better get out of my radar range!
